nested_items.name: portalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the portal.

nested_items.name: portalArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the portal, which has the following format.

nested_items.name: portalName
nested_items.description: The name of the portal.

nested_items.name: portalDescription
nested_items.description: The portal's description.

nested_items.name: portalClientId
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity Center application generated client ID (used with IAM Identity Center API operations). IoT SiteWise includes portalClientId for only portals that use IAM Identity Center to authenticate users.

nested_items.name: portalStartUrl
nested_items.description: The URL for the IoT SiteWise Monitor portal. You can use this URL to access portals that use IAM Identity Center for authentication. For portals that use IAM for authentication, you must use the IoT SiteWise console to get a URL that you can use to access the portal.

nested_items.name: portalContactEmail
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services administrator's contact email address.

nested_items.name: portalStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the portal, which contains a state and any error message.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the portal.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: portalCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the portal was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: portalLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the portal was last updated, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: portalLogoImageLocation
nested_items.description: The portal's logo image, which is available at a URL.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the image.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL where the image is available. The URL is valid for 15 minutes so that you can view and download the image.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the service role that allows the portal's users to access your IoT SiteWise resources on your behalf. For more information, see Using service roles for IoT SiteWise Monitor in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

nested_items.name: portalAuthMode
nested_items.description: The service to use to authenticate users to the portal.

nested_items.name: notificationSenderEmail
nested_items.description: The email address that sends alarm notifications.

nested_items.name: alarmRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that allows the alarm to perform actions and access Amazon Web Services resources and services, such as IoT Events.

nested_items.name: notificationLambdaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Lambda function that manages alarm notifications. For more information, see Managing alarm notifications in the IoT Events Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: portalType
nested_items.description: Define the type of portal. The value for IoT SiteWise Monitor (Classic) is SITEWISE_PORTAL_V1. The value for IoT SiteWise Monitor (AI-aware) is SITEWISE_PORTAL_V2.

nested_items.name: portalTypeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration entry associated with the specific portal type. The value for IoT SiteWise Monitor (Classic) is SITEWISE_PORTAL_V1. The value for IoT SiteWise Monitor (AI-aware) is SITEWISE_PORTAL_V2.

nested_items.name: portalTools
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: portalTools
nested_items.description: The array of tools associated with the specified portal type. The possible values are ASSISTANT and DASHBOARD.
(string) ---
